title: Symptoms log
description: Each entry describes a chronic or acute health symptom experienced in time.

calendar_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date when symptom experienced.

timestamp.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time of when symptom experienced.

person_id.description: the person who suffered the symptom.

new_occurance.description: True if symptom is new and not occured in past 7 days.
